cu.explanation_en: Setting nr_cellid to an invalid value 'invalid_cell' will cause cell identification conflicts, preventing proper cell recognition and leading to handover failures and connectivity issues.

du.explanation_en: Setting nr_cellid to an invalid value 'invalid_cell' will cause cell identification conflicts, preventing proper cell recognition and leading to handover failures and connectivity issues.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nr_cellid 設定為無效值 'invalid_cell' 會導致細胞識別衝突，阻止正確的細胞識別，並導致切換失敗和連接問題。
